summary: A small Hunter's camp just southwest of Riverwood. But more lies below....
descriptionHtml:
[i][u]Hunter’sRetreat[/u][/i]
Hunter Set
                Hunter’sHood
                Hunter’sGloves
                Hunter’sBoots
                Hunter’sCuirass
                Hunter’sRecurve
                LycanBane Silver Sword
                SilverArrows
Midnight Assassin Set
                MidnightAssassin Hood
                MidnightAssassin Boots
                MidnightAssassin Gauntlets
                MidnightAssassin Armor
                MidnightAssassin Sword
                MidnightAssassin Bow
                RavenTalon Dagger
                PoisonArrows
Followers
                Bryndol
                Reinn
                Catamar
                Ragnamar
Merchants
                Agnar the Fisher
                Lif
Mounts
                BloodSteed
 
Friendly NPC’s
                Amadeus
                Kale
                Lokeel
                Ta’jim
                Fungus

This is my first Skyrim mod. It is located about half way between Whiterun and Falkreath
as the crow flys and accross the river from the guardian stones. On the outside it looks
like just another hunter camp but underneath it lies much
more. The hunter camp features 2 followers, a merchant, crafting amenities,
Blood Steed, and a tent owned by the player. Underneath the camp is the
Hunter’s Retreat. It is a modest interior home with plenty of armor and weapon
storage as well as most crafting amenities. You will also find Lokeel and
Ragnamar. Find the secret room to find your first set of Midnight Assassin
Armor and weapons with a large quantity of both kinds of arrows. The room also
features a mannequin and two armor cases that will show off your Nightingale
rewards nicely. The master bedroom upstairs also has a set of Hunter’s Armor.
You will also find a trapdoor downstairs that leads to an underground cavern
known as the Midnight Sanctuary, home of the Midnight Assassins. Here you will
find Catamar, Kale, Taj’im, and Lif. This was designed to be a home for
vampires and offers a pond of blood and plenty of shelter from the daylight.
Within this Sanctuary you will find plenty of armor and weapons in case you
lose or sell any. At the end of the cave past the trapdoor there is another
trapdoor leading straight out to Skyrim for a quick escape. This entire mod was
designed for someone, vampire and mortal alike, who loathes werewolves and
thinks they should be hunted to the ends of the earth. I hope you all enjoy
this mod and I will probably continue to update it if there are any bugs or
improvements that need to be made. Both merchants should buy stolen goods as
well.
author: Fungous
